TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner
Public MustInherit Class StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner Inherits CompositeActivityDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 为包含结构化布局的复合活动设计器提供通用方法和属性。

span.span: Provides common methods and properties for composite activity designers that contain structured layouts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 是所有包含子设计器的设计器的基类，这些子设计器使用设计图面上呈现的称为连接器的线相互连接。The is the base class for all designers that contain child designers and the child designers are connected to each other using lines rendered on the design surface, called connectors. 提供此类可使活动设计器开发人员能够提供若干活动设计器布局类型，而不限于 类中提供的布局。The class is provided so that activity designer developers can provide a number of activity designer layout types, rather than being tied to the layout provided in the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类的基于设计器的中断来添加新的分支。The following example demonstrates the addition of a new branch using a designer based off of the class. 如果 返回 true，则使用 方法创建一个新分支。If returns true, a new branch is created using the method. 创建 对象作为 方法的参数。A object is created as a parameter to the method. 创建完成后，使用 方法确保可以通过访问 集合中的单个对象在工作流设计器中显示新添加的分支。When this is finished, the method is used to ensure that the newly added branch is displayed in the workflow designer by accessing a single object in the collection. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#28)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#28)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接器是工作流设计图面上独立的设计器之间的链接。Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface. 这些链接在设计图面上显示为线，每条线的端点连接到其所连接的设计器上的可见点。These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on the designers it connects. 这些点称为连接点。These points are called connection points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接器是工作流设计图面上独立的设计器之间的链接。Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface. 这些链接在设计图面上显示为线，每条线的端点连接到其所连接的设计器上的可见点。These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on each designer it connects. 这些点称为连接点。These points are called connection points. 继承于 类的设计器类可以包含其他设计器，而 返回由 `edges` 包含的与 关联的设计器的所有连接点的只读集合。Designer classes that inherit from the class can contain other designers, and returns a read-only collection of all the connection points for the designers associated with `edges` that are contained by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有 承载多个视图时才返回该集合。The collection is returned only if the hosts multiple views. 使用 属性可确定当前设计器承载多少个视图。Use the property to determine how many views the current designer hosts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Views As ReadOnlyCollection(Of DesignerView)

summary.span: 获取当前 承载的设计器视图的只读集合。

span.span: Gets a read-only collection of designer views that the current hosts.

value.span: 包含由当前 承载的视图的 只读集合。

span.span: The read-only collection that contains the views hosted by the current .
